summary.span: 将特定的适配器映射到给定设备的特定移动控件。

span.span: Maps specific adapters to specific mobile controls for a given device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示`device`XML 配置文件中的元素。This class represents a `device` element in an XML configuration file.
